```{r}
require(devtools)
devtools::load_all()
gset = list(
  Nmeas             = 16,
  Nfreq             = 2^10,
  trace_global      = 0,
  report_global     = 1,
  maxit_sa          = 1e2
)
freqs_global  = seq(from=1,to=24,length.out=gset$Nfreq)

ctrl_cts_arb_sa   = list(costfun_choice='svdpower',optim_method='simul_anneal',
            tfun_choice='brownian-torus',tfun_mean=0,tfun_sd=.5,
            trace=gset$trace_global,REPORT=gset$report_global,maxit=gset$maxit_sa) 

var0_cts_arb_sa   = runif(gset$Nmeas) 
res=opt_osc_power(dvar0  = var0_cts_arb_sa,
              control = ctrl_cts_arb_sa,
              freqs   = freqs_global,
              Amp     = NaN,
              cfuntype= 'ncp')
sort(res$mtvalue)
```
